items.sentence: Some people came by car. Others came by bus.
Some people will believe anything they read.
I don\'t know who you are and I don\'t care.
If you mix blue and red, you\'ll get purple.
If you tell me the truth, I\'ll forgive you.
I can drive you somewhere if you want me to.
I don\'t know when my mother will come back.
I don\'t know whether I can go there or not.
We\'re eating dinner at our friends\' place.
Would you like me to cook something for you?
There was nothing that the doctors could do.
There was shouting and confusion everywhere.
There were a lot of things Tom wanted to do.
You must be tired of all Tom\'s complaining.
I had no idea that this was going to happen.
My eyesight isn\'t as good as it used to be.
Tickets are $30 for adults and $15 for kids.
Tom always seems to be getting into trouble.
Tom and I both enjoy watching horror movies.
Tom and Mary always walk to school together.
